title: Delia and Rosamond augmented Cleopatra by Samuel Daniel.
author: Daniel, Samuel, 1562-1619.
publisher: [By James Roberts and Edward Allde] for Simon Waterson, and are to be sold in Paules Church-yarde at the signe of the Crowne,
notes: "The complaynt of Rosamond" and "The tragedie of Cleopatra" have separate divisional title pages, the second dated; register is continuous.
Identified as STC 6254 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
